sqlMap.select: select GROUPID, ORGID, PARENTGROUPID, GROUPLEVEL, GROUPNAME, GROUPDESC, GROUPTYPE, GROUPSEQ, STARTDATE, ENDDATE, GROUPSTATUS, MANAGER, CREATETIME, LASTUPDATE, UPDATOR, ISLEAF, SUBCOUNT, CREATEUSERID from OM_GROUP where GROUPID = #groupid:DECIMAL#

select GROUPID, ORGID, PARENTGROUPID, GROUPLEVEL, GROUPNAME, GROUPDESC, GROUPTYPE, GROUPSEQ, STARTDATE, ENDDATE, GROUPSTATUS, MANAGER, CREATETIME, LASTUPDATE, UPDATOR, ISLEAF, SUBCOUNT, CREATEUSERID from OM_GROUP
order by $orderByClause$
sqlMap.insert:
select SEQ_ABF_SYS.nextval from dual
insert into OM_GROUP (GROUPID, ORGID, PARENTGROUPID, GROUPLEVEL, GROUPNAME, GROUPDESC, GROUPTYPE, GROUPSEQ, STARTDATE, ENDDATE, GROUPSTATUS, MANAGER, CREATETIME, LASTUPDATE, UPDATOR, ISLEAF, SUBCOUNT, CREATEUSERID,EMPID) values (#groupid:DECIMAL:-9999#, #orgid:DECIMAL:-9999#, #parentgroupid:DECIMAL:-9999#, #grouplevel:DECIMAL:-9999#, #groupname:VARCHAR#, #groupdesc:VARCHAR#, #grouptype:VARCHAR#, #groupseq:VARCHAR#, #startdate:TIMESTAMP#, #enddate:TIMESTAMP#, #groupstatus:VARCHAR#, #manager:VARCHAR#, #createtime:DATE#, #lastupdate:DATE#, #updator:DECIMAL:-9999#, #isleaf:CHAR#, #subcount:DECIMAL:-9999#, #createuserid:VARCHAR#,#empid:DECIMAL:-9999#)
sqlMap.update: update OM_GROUP set ORGID = #orgid:DECIMAL#, PARENTGROUPID = #parentgroupid:DECIMAL#, GROUPLEVEL = #grouplevel:DECIMAL#, GROUPNAME = #groupname:VARCHAR#, GROUPDESC = #groupdesc:VARCHAR#, GROUPTYPE = #grouptype:VARCHAR#, GROUPSEQ = #groupseq:VARCHAR#, STARTDATE = #startdate:TIMESTAMP#, ENDDATE = #enddate:TIMESTAMP#, GROUPSTATUS = #groupstatus:VARCHAR#, MANAGER = #manager:VARCHAR#, CREATETIME = #createtime:DATE#, LASTUPDATE = #lastupdate:DATE#, UPDATOR = #updator:DECIMAL#, ISLEAF = #isleaf:CHAR#, SUBCOUNT = #subcount:DECIMAL#, CREATEUSERID = #createuserid:VARCHAR# where GROUPID = #groupid:DECIMAL#
